content: love this cotton worsted weight 4 round 1 make a foundation half_double_crochet for 34 sts unstretched this should measure 7 ¾ -8 join with a slip_stitch in first st taking care not to twist the row you will complete the rest of this seam at the finishing stage round 2 chain 1 working in 3lo for this round *yo insert hook into same st yo over and pull up a loop repeat from * once yo pull through all 5 loops on hook a double crochet grouping is made you will make a double_crochet grouping in the 3lo of every stitch around **yo insert hook into 3lo of next st yo over and pull up a loop repeat from ** once yo pull through all 5 loops on hook repeat from ** for every stitch around join with invj 34 double_crochet groupings round 3 tilt your work towards you to see the back of the round of stitches here you will see a horizontal bar alternating with the vertical double_crochet grouping similar to working in the 3lo you will be working only in the back horizontal bar for this round as you proceed it will seem like you are skipping a st by skipping over the vertical grouping but you are only working in each horizontal bar between the double_crochet groupings for a correct total of 34 sts this photo shows the back of the work tilted forward with arrows indicating the back vertical bars that you will work into chain 1 working only in the back vertical bar make 1 single_crochet in the same st insert hook yo and draw up a loop *in the next vertical bar insert hook yo draw up a loop repeat from * once there should be 4 loops on hook yo pull through all 4 loops chain 1 a single_crochet cluster is made do the chain 1 for each cluster a little loosely as it will make it easier for a stitch to go in there in the next round **insert hook into same st as the coffee cup cozy sampler set by amy drossner copyright © may 2022 6 the last st of the previous single_crochet cluster yo draw up a loop *in the next vertical bar insert hook yo draw up a loop repeat from * once there should be 4 loops on hook yo pull through all 4 loops chain 1 repeat from ** for every stitch around join with invj 34 sts and 17 single_crochet clusters this photo shows where you will insert your hook at each step of each single_crochet cluster for rounds 4-7 round 4 chain 1 single_crochet in same st in the same st insert hook yo and draw up a loop *in the next st insert hook
